docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''WE must begin by understanding. Understanding why the newborn infant suffers so much.'' The call was Dr. Frederick Leboyer's in his book ''Birth Without Violence,'' first published in France in 1974.

headline.main: For Infants, Quiet And a Warm Bath
